      Method that returns a parser object containing the created Java objects after parsing an OSM file
      void parseOSMFile(java.lang.String filePath)
      Method that takes an OSM file and creates all the nodes and tags as Java Objects The parser object then contains a map with all the nodes and a treemap with all the tags

      Method that outputs a list of existing tags to the console

    • Method Detail

      • parseOSMFile

        public void parseOSMFile(java.lang.String filePath)
        Method that takes an OSM file and creates all the nodes and tags as Java Objects The parser object then contains a map with all the nodes and a treemap with all the tags
        Parameters:
        filePath - Filepath of the OSM file that is to be parsed

      • findLocations

        public java.util.ArrayList<Location> findLocations(java.lang.String tagForSearch,
                                                   Location currentLocation,
                                                   OSMParser parser)
        Method that returns a list of locations within the default radius of 5km Before using this method it is necessary to have created a "parser" object and parse the OSM file
        Parameters:
        tagForSearch - A keyword (or tag) for the search
        currentLocation - Starting Location as the center of the search radius
        parser - Parser object that contains the created Java objects after parsing an OSM file
        Returns:
        ArrayList containing found locations

      • findLocationsWithRadius

        public java.util.ArrayList<Location> findLocationsWithRadius(java.lang.Double radius,
                                                             java.lang.String tagForSearch,
                                                             Location currentLocation,
                                                             OSMParser parser)
        Method that finds locations using a self defined search radius in kilometres
        Parameters:
        radius - Search radius in kilometres
        tagForSearch - A keyword (or tag) for the search
        currentLocation - Starting Location as the center of the search radius
        parser - Parser object that contains the created Java objects after parsing an OSM file
        Returns:
        ArrayList containing found locations

      • findLocationsWithinBoundingBox

        public java.util.ArrayList<Location> findLocationsWithinBoundingBox(BoundingBox box,
                                                                    java.lang.String tagForSearch,
                                                                    OSMParser parser)
        Method that finds locations within a BoundingBox
        Parameters:
        box - A BoundingBox Object that defines the corners of a rectangle-shaped area
        tagForSearch - A keyword (or tag) for the search
        parser - Parser object that contains the created Java objects after parsing an OSM file
        Returns:
        ArrayList containing found locations

      • findLocationsWithRegEx

        public java.util.ArrayList<Location> findLocationsWithRegEx(java.lang.String regex,
                                                            Location currentLocation,
                                                            OSMParser parser)
        Method that finds locations using regular expressions with the default radius of 5km
        Parameters:
        regex - Regular Expression to search for tags
        currentLocation - Starting Location as the center of the search radius
        parser - Parser object that contains the created Java objects after parsing an OSM file
        Returns:
        ArrayList containing found locations

        public void printTagsToTxtFile(OSMParser parser,
                               java.lang.String newFilePath)
        Method that outputs a list of existing tags to a txt file
        Parameters:
        parser - Parser object that contains the created Java objects after parsing an OSM file
